column4: Hi -- need permissions help.  I have a folder "gramps" with permissions for group to write to: drwxrwxr-x 3 root users 104 2006-09-02 12:29 gramps/ but a normal user can't write to it! e.g. $ touch gramps/test restults in: touch: cannot touch `gramps/test': Permission denied
you need to add users to the group users :)
hmm maybe not.  What is the command to add this user to group users?
